member.name: M:SystemWrapper.IO.MemoryStreamWrap.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a block of bytes from the current stream and writes the data to buffer.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current stream.
The byte offset in buffer at which to begin reading.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The total number of bytes written into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached before any bytes are read.

member.name: M:SystemWrapper.IO.MemoryStreamWrap.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the current stream.

member.name: M:SystemWrapper.IO.MemoryStreamWrap.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Sets the position within the current stream to the specified value.
member.param: The new position within the stream. This is relative to the loc parameter, and can be positive or negative.
A value of type SeekOrigin, which acts as the seek reference point.
member.returns: The new position within the stream, calculated by combining the initial reference point and the offset.
